comments.content: There would be a version of ' [Flamenco](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054734/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Flamenco)' _( by URW++ )_ without the inlining outline_, as well_..

Soo, I may second Yves on the manually filled in outlining inline version of 'Flamenco'.. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054734im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)
